title: I should not be matched against a d1 draven + p5 tarok duo

embed.description: Dasdi96 / Silver 3 12LP / 60W 61L Win Ratio 50% / Annie - 23W 18L Win Ratio 56%, Poppy - 4W 5L Win Ratio 44%, Ahri - 4W 5L Win Ratio 44%, Sejuani - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Jarvan IV - 3W 5L Win Ratio 38%

body: That is just bogus. How is a silver 3 like me with shit mechanics supposed to learn anything when the enemy draven shit stomps me because I can't land anything on him. Roaming isn't even a good option.

replies.body:
Because it's normals, and normals have their own seperate mmr.


And ig learn from higher elo movements?

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AgAHJY8N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-29T03:08:21.009+0000)
>
> Because it's normals, and normals have their own seperate mmr.
> 
> 
> And ig learn from higher elo movements?

I am wondering how this guy is still at silver-gold normal mmr when he has played many normal games in the past few months. He usually somehow gets matched with at most platinum 3 and as low as bronze 3. I am starting to feel like the normals mmr system is pure random.

Because all sorts of ranks duo with their friends.

As is normals.

Also, not everyone takes normals the same... theres tons of lower elos that take normals serious while many higher elos just troll or do whatever in normals. creating mixed matchings.


and you answered it yourself, plays with bronze 3 - plat 3 players, and who knows how many of those are with friends and such
